channel.title: Pages on Biased
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Biased

item.title: About
item.description: About Hi! My name is Sean and I work as a research scientist at the Norwegian Computing Center. I have a B.A. in media studies, a B.A. in journalism and an M.Sc. in statistics. I used to be in the newspaper business, but now I work with applications of deep learning in image processing. I’m interested in pretty much everything. I’m particularly fond of wrangling and visualising data (although I consider myself a novice).
